Title: "Falungong's" anti-scientific lies confuse the public
Designer: Zhang Hongwei (张宏伟)Kong Simeng (孔思孟)
Publisher: Zhongyang minzu daxue chubanshe (中央民族大学出版社)
Notes: Second sheet of the series Privately encourage healthy practices, eradicate evil cults (私扬正气铲除邪教), published in 2001.The poster shows stills from Falun Gong video's and printed materials, and photographs of victims.
Theme: Privately encourage healthy practices, eradicate evil cultsFalun Gong
